edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.visualization

Class Plotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.visualization.Plotter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeometricPlot.GeometricRasterizer, HDFPlot.HDFRasterizer, HeatMapPlot.HeatMapRasterizer, LakesPlot.LakePlotter, MagickPlot.MagickPlotter

    public abstract class Plotter
extends Object
    An abstract interface for a component that draws shapes

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Configures this plotter according to the MapReduce program.
        Parameters:
        conf -

      • smooth

        public <S extends Shape> Iterable<S> smooth(Iterable<S> r)
        Smooth a set of records that are spatially close to each other and returns a new set of smoothed records. This method is called on the original raw data before it is visualized. The results of this function are the records that are visualized.
        Parameters:
        r -
        Returns:

      • createCanvas

        public abstract Canvas createCanvas(int width,
                  int height,
                  Rectangle mbr)
        Creates an empty canvas of the given width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - - Width of the created layer in pixels
        height - - Height of the created layer in pixels
        mbr - - The minimal bounding rectangle of the layer in the input
        Returns:

      • plot

        public abstract void plot(Canvas layer,
        Shape shape)
        Plots one shape to the given layer
        Parameters:
        layer - - the canvas to plot to. This canvas has to be created using the method createCanvas(int, int, Rectangle).
        shape - - the shape to plot

      • merge

        public abstract void merge(Canvas finalLayer,
         Canvas intermediateLayer)
        Merges an intermediate layer into the final layer based on its location
        Parameters:
        finalLayer -
        intermediateLayer -

      • writeImage

        public abstract void writeImage(Canvas layer,
              DataOutputStream out,
              boolean vflip)
                         throws IOException
        Writes a canvas as an image to the output.
        Parameters:
        layer - - the layer to be written to the output as an image
        out - - the output stream to which the image will be written
        vflip - - if true, the image is vertically flipped before written
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isSmooth

        public boolean isSmooth()
        Tells whether this plotter supports a smooth function or not.
        Returns:

      • getCanvasClass

        public Class<? extends Canvas> getCanvasClass()
        Returns the raster class associated with this rasterizer
        Returns:

      • plot

        public void plot(Canvas layer,
        Iterable<? extends Shape> shapes)
        Plots a set of shapes to the given layer
        Parameters:
        layer - - the canvas to plot to. This canvas has to be created using the method createCanvas(int, int, Rectangle).
        shapes - - a set of shapes to plot
